title: API Authentication and Security
summary: Comprehensive guide to API authentication methods and common security issues
content: This article covers the various authentication methods supported by our API, including OAuth 2.0, API keys, and JWT tokens. Common troubleshooting steps for authentication failures are also provided.

title: Payment Processing Failures
summary: How to resolve common payment processing issues and failed transactions
content: This guide helps customers understand why payments might fail and provides step-by-step instructions for resolving common payment issues, including expired cards, insufficient funds, and billing address mismatches.

title: Account Setup and Configuration
summary: Complete walkthrough for new account setup and initial configuration
content: New users can follow this comprehensive guide to set up their account, configure basic settings, and get started with our platform. Includes screenshots and video tutorials.

title: Database Connection Troubleshooting
summary: Diagnosing and fixing database connection issues
content: This technical guide covers common database connection problems, including timeout issues, connection pool exhaustion, and network connectivity problems. Includes SQL troubleshooting queries.

title: Subscription Management and Billing Cycles
summary: Understanding subscription billing cycles and management options
content: Learn how to manage your subscription, understand billing cycles, upgrade or downgrade plans, and handle prorated charges. Includes information about annual vs monthly billing options.

title: Feature Overview and Best Practices
summary: Comprehensive overview of platform features and usage best practices
content: Discover all the features available in our platform and learn best practices for maximizing their effectiveness. Includes use cases, examples, and optimization tips.

title: Product Pricing and Plan Comparison
summary: Detailed comparison of our pricing plans and included features
content: Compare our different pricing tiers, understand what's included in each plan, and find the right solution for your needs. Includes ROI calculations and upgrade path information.

title: Enterprise Integration Guide
summary: Guide for enterprise-level integrations including SSO and LDAP
content: Comprehensive documentation for enterprise customers looking to integrate our platform with existing systems. Covers SSO setup, LDAP integration, and custom API endpoints.

title: Refund and Cancellation Policy
summary: Understanding our refund policy and cancellation procedures
content: Complete information about our refund policy, including eligibility criteria, processing timelines, and step-by-step cancellation procedures. Also covers partial refunds and prorated amounts.

title: Security Best Practices
summary: Essential security practices for protecting your account
content: Learn how to secure your account with strong passwords, two-factor authentication, and other security measures. Includes guidelines for API key management and access control.

title: Custom Solution Architecture
summary: Designing custom solutions for enterprise clients
content: Information about our custom solution offerings, including architecture consulting, bespoke development, and enterprise support packages. Perfect for large organizations with unique requirements.

title: API Rate Limits and Performance
summary: Understanding API rate limits and optimizing API performance
content: Learn about our API rate limiting policies, how to optimize your API calls for better performance, and strategies for handling rate limit errors. Includes caching recommendations.
